Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/Ohio
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Red Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier police activity at 87th. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier police activity at 87th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
